trans-unit.source: Enumerates the partition restart mode for Testability actions.
trans-unit.target: Enumerates the partition restart mode for Testability actions.

trans-unit.source: All the replicas for the partition will be restarted using the <codeEntityReference>Overload:System.Fabric.Testability.Preview.FabricClientTestabilityExtensionsPreview.RestartPartitionAsync</codeEntityReference> method.
trans-unit.target: All the replicas for the partition will be restarted using the <codeEntityReference>Overload:System.Fabric.Testability.Preview.FabricClientTestabilityExtensionsPreview.RestartPartitionAsync</codeEntityReference> method.

trans-unit.source: The API will ensure all replicas are down at the same time.
trans-unit.target: The API will ensure all replicas are down at the same time.

trans-unit.source: Only the secondary replicas will be restarted.
trans-unit.target: Only the secondary replicas will be restarted.

trans-unit.source: The API ensures all the secondary replicas are down at the same time before they all allowed to come back up.
trans-unit.target: The API ensures all the secondary replicas are down at the same time before they all allowed to come back up.
